  • Method Details

    • submitCustomerBtn

      public void submitCustomerBtn(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      The submitCustomerBtn method is an on actionEvent that will submit NEW customer entries. The method extracts information from the fields, performs basic validation and then uses the DBCustomer.addCustomer method to create a new customer entry.
      Throws:
      IOException

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL url, ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      The initialize method populates the customer view by retrieving information from the Database. Lambda Expression - The lambda expression is used to automatically update the customer infor boxes and also enables the use of the update button. This expression is not only a quality of life feature for users, but also avoids adding a button, and action event item to the view.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
      Parameters:
      url -
      resourceBundle -

    • countryClick

      public void countryClick(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      The countryClick method updates the state combo-box depending on which Country is selected.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent -

    • updateCustomerFields

      public void updateCustomerFields()
      The updateCustomerClicked method updates the forms, and combo boxes of the view with the selected customer from the table view.
